p: None of the cats showed any adverse reaction to the drug. Data obtained from different time points before (day 1 at time 0, 1, 3, and 6, and day 2 at time 0) and after (day 2 at time 1, 3 and 6) pimobendan administration were pooled together. The statistical comparison was then performed between two global time points (before and after pimobendan administration).
